attributes.action: produce the evidence that human activity is causing climate change
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the prime minister should publish the facts explaining how human activity on earth is creating climate change, if there are any.

In stead of quoting certain hand picked scientists to air their domesday predictions and wild assumptions we should be told, clearly and in a scientific manner, exactly where is the proof?

why do we not hear from the eminent scientists and ecologists who beleive it is simply not happening?

why was i being assured 30 years ago as a schoolboy by the all-knowing scientists of the day, that we were heading for another ice age "for sure, it's only a matter of time....."?
